item.title: Inazuma Eleven: Victory Road free major update ‘Galaxy & LBX DLC’ launches December 21
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

New Routes, Re-Story, BB Stadium Teams, and more.

LEVEL-5 will release the Inazuma Eleven: Victory Road free major update “Galaxy & LBX DLC” on December 21, the developer announced.

Here is an overview of the update, via today’s announcement trailer:

  • The Grand Celesta Galaxy Conquer stadiums with planet-specific effects. Relive the fierce clashes with rivals from beyond the stars! Journey across space and rise to the top of the universe!
  • New Routes: “Galaxy” and “Inazuma VS LBX”
  • New Re-Story
  • New BB Stadium Teams
  • New 2P Tag Mode
  • Commander Ladder
  • High Speed Commander Mode
  • Story-Based Positioning for Combination Moves
  • New Character Rarity: FABLED – Stronger than HERO and adaptable to any build. Only one can join each match.
  • Marketplace: Atrium of the Untamed

Inazuma Eleven: Victory Road is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam.

Watch the trailer below.

Free Major Update “Galaxy & LBX DLC” Trailer
